SELECT
uploadResultTime AS time, devName AS equip, SC_PART AS part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, ID as id, RESULT AS value, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level, std_value AS standard FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE( (DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备" AND devName="简摆颚式破碎机") OR (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND devName="简摆颚式破碎机电机") OR (DEPT_NAME="碎矿生产" AND devName="简摆颚式破碎机")) AND (ALTPID = 1 OR ALTPID = 2) and alarm_flag='N' AND date(TASKSTART_TM) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY uploadResultTime DESC;
